mapper.select: SELECT e.emp_id, e.emp_name, d.emp_dept_name AS 'dept_name', COALESCE((SELECT DATE_FORMAT(ch.work_start_time, '%H:%i') AS work FROM commute_history ch WHERE ch.work_day = #{date} AND e.emp_id = ch.emp_id), '00:00') AS work_start, COALESCE((SELECT DATE_FORMAT(ch.work_end_time, '%H:%i') AS work FROM commute_history ch WHERE ch.work_day = #{date} AND e.emp_id = ch.emp_id), '00:00') AS work_end, COALESCE((SELECT DATE_FORMAT(vh.vaca_start, '%H:%i') AS work FROM vacation_history vh WHERE vh.vaca_date = #{date} AND e.emp_id = vh.emp_id LIMIT 1), '-') AS vaca_start, COALESCE((SELECT DATE_FORMAT(vh.vaca_end_time, '%H:%i') AS work FROM vacation_history vh WHERE vh.vaca_date = #{date} AND e.emp_id = vh.emp_id LIMIT 1), '-') AS vaca_end, COALESCE((SELECT DATE_FORMAT(ch.work_started, '%H:%i') AS work FROM commute_history ch WHERE ch.work_day = #{date} AND e.emp_id = ch.emp_id), '00:00') AS work_started, COALESCE((SELECT DATE_FORMAT(ch.work_ended, '%H:%i') AS work FROM commute_history ch WHERE ch.work_day = #{date} AND e.emp_id = ch.emp_id), '00:00') AS work_ended, COALESCE((SELECT work_state FROM commute_history ch WHERE ch.work_day = #{date} AND e.emp_id = ch.emp_id), '-') AS work_state, COALESCE((f.ori_file_name),'default') AS ori_file_name, COALESCE((f.new_file_name),'default') AS new_file_name FROM employee e JOIN department d ON e.emp_dept_idx = d.emp_dept_idx LEFT JOIN file f ON e.emp_id = f.file_kind_idx WHERE e.emp_id NOT IN ('master') AND leavedate = '9999-10-10' ORDER BY e.emp_date desc LIMIT 10 offset #{offset};

SELECT e.emp_id, e.emp_name, d.emp_dept_name AS 'dept_name', COALESCE((SELECT DATE_FORMAT(ch.work_start_time, '%H:%i') AS work FROM commute_history ch WHERE ch.work_day = #{date} AND e.emp_id = ch.emp_id), '00:00') AS work_start, COALESCE((SELECT DATE_FORMAT(ch.work_end_time, '%H:%i') AS work FROM commute_history ch WHERE ch.work_day = #{date} AND e.emp_id = ch.emp_id), '00:00') AS work_end, COALESCE((SELECT DATE_FORMAT(vh.vaca_start, '%H:%i') AS work FROM vacation_history vh WHERE vh.vaca_date = #{date} AND e.emp_id = vh.emp_id LIMIT 1), '-') AS vaca_start, COALESCE((SELECT DATE_FORMAT(vh.vaca_end_time, '%H:%i') AS work FROM vacation_history vh WHERE vh.vaca_date = #{date} AND e.emp_id = vh.emp_id LIMIT 1), '-') AS vaca_end, COALESCE((SELECT DATE_FORMAT(ch.work_started, '%H:%i') AS work FROM commute_history ch WHERE ch.work_day = #{date} AND e.emp_id = ch.emp_id), '00:00') AS work_started, COALESCE((SELECT DATE_FORMAT(ch.work_ended, '%H:%i') AS work FROM commute_history ch WHERE ch.work_day = #{date} AND e.emp_id = ch.emp_id), '00:00') AS work_ended, COALESCE((SELECT work_state FROM commute_history ch WHERE ch.work_day = #{date} AND e.emp_id = ch.emp_id), '-') AS work_state, COALESCE((f.ori_file_name),'default') AS ori_file_name, COALESCE((f.new_file_name),'default') AS new_file_name FROM employee e JOIN department d ON e.emp_dept_idx = d.emp_dept_idx LEFT JOIN file f ON e.emp_id = f.file_kind_idx WHERE e.emp_id NOT IN ('master') AND leavedate = '9999-10-10' AND e.emp_dept_idx = #{login_dept} ORDER BY e.emp_date desc LIMIT 10 offset #{offset};
SELECT CEIL(COUNT(emp_id)/10) AS pages FROM employee WHERE emp_id NOT IN ('master') AND leavedate = '9999-10-10' AND emp_dept_idx = #{login_dept};

SELECT e.emp_id, e.emp_name, e.hiredate, d.emp_dept_name, COALESCE((SELECT SUM(ev.add_hour) FROM emp_vacation ev WHERE ev.emp_id = e.emp_id), 0) AS totalhour, COALESCE((SELECT SUM(vh.use_hour) FROM vacation_history vh WHERE vh.emp_id = e.emp_id), 0) AS usehour, (COALESCE((SELECT SUM(ev.add_hour) FROM emp_vacation ev WHERE ev.emp_id = e.emp_id), 0) - COALESCE((SELECT SUM(vh.use_hour) FROM vacation_history vh WHERE vh.emp_id = e.emp_id), 0)) AS remainhour, COALESCE ((SELECT SUM(add_hour) FROM emp_vacation ev WHERE ev.emp_id = e.emp_id AND vaca_name = '연차'), 0) AS yearhour, COALESCE ((SELECT SUM(add_hour) FROM emp_vacation ev WHERE ev.emp_id = e.emp_id AND vaca_name = '월차'), 0) AS monthhour, COALESCE ((SELECT SUM(add_hour) FROM emp_vacation ev WHERE ev.emp_id = e.emp_id AND vaca_name = '이월'), 0) AS overhour, COALESCE ((SELECT SUM(add_hour) FROM emp_vacation ev WHERE ev.emp_id = e.emp_id AND vaca_name = '조정연차'), 0) AS createhour FROM employee e JOIN department d ON e.emp_dept_idx = d.emp_dept_idx WHERE emp_id = #{login_id};

SELECT e.emp_name, d.emp_dept_name, vh.use_hour, DATE_FORMAT(vh.vaca_start, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS vaca_start, DATE_FORMAT(vh.vaca_end_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS vaca_end_time, vh.vaca_reason FROM employee e JOIN vacation_history vh ON e.emp_id = vh.emp_id JOIN department d ON e.emp_dept_idx = d.emp_dept_idx WHERE e.emp_id = #{login_id} ORDER BY vh.vaca_date_in ASC;
SELECT add_date, del_date, add_hour, add_vaca_reason FROM emp_vacation ev WHERE emp_id = #{login_id};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO commute_history (emp_id, work_day, work_start_time, work_end_time, work_date_in) VALUES(#{login_id}, #{workdate}, #{work_start_time}, #{work_end_time}, now());
mapper.select: SELECT ch.work_day, COALESCE(DATE_FORMAT(ch.work_start_time, '%H:%i'), '00:00') AS work_start, COALESCE(DATE_FORMAT(ch.work_end_time, '%H:%i'), '00:00') AS work_end, COALESCE(DATE_FORMAT(vh.vaca_start, '%H:%i'), '00:00') AS vaca_start, COALESCE(DATE_FORMAT(vh.vaca_end_time, '%H:%i'), '00:00') AS vaca_end, COALESCE(DATE_FORMAT(ch.work_started, '%H:%i'), '00:00') AS work_started, COALESCE(DATE_FORMAT(ch.work_ended, '%H:%i'), '00:00') AS work_ended, COALESCE(ch.work_state, '-') AS work_state, COALESCE(vh.doc_code, '0') AS doc_code FROM commute_history ch JOIN employee e ON e.emp_id = ch.emp_id LEFT JOIN vacation_history vh ON ch.work_day = vh.vaca_date AND e.emp_id = vh.emp_id WHERE e.emp_id = #{emp_id} AND ch.work_day LIKE CONCAT(#{modaldate}, '-%') ORDER BY ch.work_day asc;

SELECT ch.work_day, COALESCE(DATE_FORMAT(ch.work_start_time, '%H:%i'), '00:00') AS work_start, COALESCE(DATE_FORMAT(ch.work_end_time, '%H:%i'), '00:00') AS work_end, COALESCE(DATE_FORMAT(vh.vaca_start, '%H:%i'), '00:00') AS vaca_start, COALESCE(DATE_FORMAT(vh.vaca_end_time, '%H:%i'), '00:00') AS vaca_end, COALESCE(DATE_FORMAT(ch.work_started, '%H:%i'), '00:00') AS work_started, COALESCE(DATE_FORMAT(ch.work_ended, '%H:%i'), '00:00') AS work_ended, COALESCE(ch.work_state, '-') AS work_state, COALESCE(vh.doc_code, '0') AS doc_code FROM commute_history ch JOIN employee e ON e.emp_id = ch.emp_id LEFT JOIN vacation_history vh ON ch.work_day = vh.vaca_date AND e.emp_id = vh.emp_id WHERE e.emp_id = #{emp_id} AND ch.work_day LIKE CONCAT(#{modaldate}, '-%') AND work_state = '정상' ORDER BY ch.work_day asc;

SELECT ch.work_day, COALESCE(DATE_FORMAT(ch.work_start_time, '%H:%i'), '00:00') AS work_start, COALESCE(DATE_FORMAT(ch.work_end_time, '%H:%i'), '00:00') AS work_end, COALESCE(DATE_FORMAT(vh.vaca_start, '%H:%i'), '00:00') AS vaca_start, COALESCE(DATE_FORMAT(vh.vaca_end_time, '%H:%i'), '00:00') AS vaca_end, COALESCE(DATE_FORMAT(ch.work_started, '%H:%i'), '00:00') AS work_started, COALESCE(DATE_FORMAT(ch.work_ended, '%H:%i'), '00:00') AS work_ended, COALESCE(ch.work_state, '-') AS work_state, COALESCE(vh.doc_code, '0') AS doc_code FROM commute_history ch JOIN employee e ON e.emp_id = ch.emp_id LEFT JOIN vacation_history vh ON ch.work_day = vh.vaca_date AND e.emp_id = vh.emp_id WHERE e.emp_id = #{emp_id} AND ch.work_day LIKE CONCAT(#{modaldate}, '-%') AND work_state = '미달' ORDER BY ch.work_day asc;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM commute_history WHERE emp_id = #{login_id} AND work_day = #{workdate}

SELECT ch.work_day, COALESCE(CONCAT(LPAD(HOUR(ch.work_start_time), 2, '0'),':',LPAD(MINUTE(ch.work_start_time), 2, '0')), '00:00') AS work_start, COALESCE(CONCAT(LPAD(HOUR(ch.work_end_time), 2, '0'),':',LPAD(MINUTE(ch.work_end_time), 2, '0')), '00:00') AS work_end, COALESCE(CONCAT(LPAD(HOUR(vh.vaca_start), 2, '0'),':',LPAD(MINUTE(vh.vaca_start), 2, '0')), '00:00') AS vaca_start, COALESCE(CONCAT(LPAD(HOUR(vh.vaca_end_time), 2, '0'),':',LPAD(MINUTE(vh.vaca_end_time), 2, '0')), '00:00') AS vaca_end FROM commute_history ch LEFT JOIN vacation_history vh ON ch.work_day = vh.vaca_date WHERE ch.emp_id = #{login_id} AND ch.work_day LIKE CONCAT(#{workmonth}, '-%') ORDER BY ch.work_day asc;

SELECT COALESCE(vh.doc_code, '0') AS doc_code, vh.vaca_date, COALESCE(CONCAT(LPAD(HOUR(vh.vaca_start), 2, '0'),':',LPAD(MINUTE(vh.vaca_start), 2, '0')), '00:00') AS vaca_start, COALESCE(CONCAT(LPAD(HOUR(vh.vaca_end_time), 2, '0'),':',LPAD(MINUTE(vh.vaca_end_time), 2, '0')), '00:00') AS vaca_end FROM vacation_history vh WHERE vh.emp_id = #{login_id} ORDER BY vh.vaca_date;
